updateActivationAfterAddingNewPredecessor(PTNArc, PTNTransition) - Method in class q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.models.PTNNet
When we add a new arc and the target is a transition node we have to check if activation status of that node must be changed.
updateAdjacentTransitionsState(PTNINodeDTO) - Method in class q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.utils.PTNNodeHelper
When the token attribute of a place has been changed, this methods checks if the state of succeeding transitions must be updated.
updateArcs(String, Point, Point) - Method in class q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.views.desktop.PTNDesktop
Draws an arc and adds it to arc view list if it's a new one that was just painted.
updateArcs(ArcView) - Method in class q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.views.desktop.PTNDesktop
Overloads PTNDesktop.updateArcs(java.lang.String, java.awt.Point, java.awt.Point)(String id, Point start, Point end) so methods can also directly use arc view objects.
updateArcsForNode(NodeView) - Method in class q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.controllers.PTNNetController
Handles redrawing all incoming and outgoing arcs for a node that has been moved for the view.
updateNodeAttributes(NodeView, PTNINodeDTO) - Method in class q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.controllers.PTNNetController
Updates node attributes after an update Window was closed.
updateNodeModelLocation(NodeView) - Method in class q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.controllers.PTNNetController
 
updateNodeModelLocation(NodeView) - Method in class q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.utils.PTNNodeHelper

updateSize(int) - Method in class q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.views.PlaceView
Adopts token label to scale and updates global scale info for this node type.
updateSize(int) - Method in class q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.views.TransitionView
Updates global scale info for this node type.
updateToken(int) - Method in class q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.views.PlaceView
Setter.
updateTransitionState(PTNINodeDTO) - Method in class q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.utils.PTNNodeHelper
This method checks if the transition's activation state has to be changed, e. g. after an arc has been deleted.
